description.name: SPED - Escrituracao Contabil Digital - TIPO G
description.destination: A todas as empresas usuarias de sistema de escrituracao contabil digital'
description.object: Permitir que as empresas intimadas apresentem dados relativos aos seus negocios e/ou atividades economicas.
description.delivery: As informacoes serao apresentadas pelas pessoas juridicas quando solicitadas pelo fisco ou orgao regulador de setor

register.description: Outras inscricoes cadastrais do empresario ou sociedade empresaria

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCS2",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS2") + " WHERE CS2_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CS2_CNPJ != '"+CS2->CS2_CNPJ+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS2") )
ECDQuery("TMPCSR",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSR") + " WHERE CSR_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSR") )
ECDQuery("TMPCS9",1,"SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS9") + " WHERE CS9_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS9") )

register.description: Identificacao do relacionamento com o participante

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery( "TMPCSW",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSW") + " WHERE CSW_CODLAY = '" + iif (lMoedfun, SUBSTR(CS0->CS0_MOEFUN, 9, 3),'') + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSW" ) + " ORDER BY " + iif (lMoedfun,"CSW_REGECD,","")+ " CSW_ORDEM " )
ECDQuery( "TMPCS3",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS3") + " WHERE CS3_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS3" ) )
ECDQuery("TMPCS4",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS4") + " WHERE CS4_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CS4_CONTA = '"+TMPCS3->CS3_CONTA+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS4"))
ECDQuery( "TMPCS6" ,1, " SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS6") + " WHERE CS6_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CS6_CONTA = '"+TMPCS3->CS3_CONTA+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS6"))
ECDQuery("TMPCST",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CST") + " WHERE CST_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CST_CTAPAI = '"+TMPCS3->CS3_CONTA+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CST"))
ECDQuery( "TMPCS7" ,1, " SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS7") + " WHERE CS7_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS7"))
ECDQuery("TMPCS5" ,1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS5") + " WHERE CS5_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS5"))

ECDQuery("AGLCSC",1," SELECT CSC_DTINI,CSC_DTFIM FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSC") + " WHERE CSC_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSC") + " GROUP BY CSC_DTINI,CSC_DTFIM ORDER BY CSC_DTINI,CSC_DTFIM " )

ECDQuery("TMPCSC",1, " SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSC") + " WHERE CSC_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSC_DTINI >= '"+AGLCSC->CSC_DTINI+"' AND CSC_DTFIM <= '"+AGLCSC->CSC_DTFIM+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSC") )
ECDQuery( "TMPCSA",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSA") + " WHERE CSA_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSA"))

ECDQuery("TMPCSB",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSB") + " WHERE CSB_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSB_NUMLOT = '" + TMPCSA->CSA_NUMLOT + "' AND CSB_DTLANC = '" + TMPCSA->CSA_DTLANC + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSB"))

register.description: Saldo das contas de resultado antes do encerramento

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery( "TMPCSAENC",1, "SELECT CSA_DTLANC FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSA") +" WHERE CSA_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CSA_DTLANC >= '"+DTOS(CS0->CS0_DTINI)+"' AND CSA_DTLANC <= '"+DTOS(CS0->CS0_DTFIM)+"' AND CSA_INDTIP = 'E' AND "+ RetSQLCond("CSA") + " GROUP BY CSA_DTLANC ORDER BY CSA_DTLANC" )

register.description: Detalhes dos Saldos das contas de resultado antes do encerramento

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery( "TMPCSBENC" ,1,"SELECT CSB_CODCTA,CSB_CCUSTO,SUM(CSB_VLPART) CSB_VLPART FROM(SELECT CSB_CODCTA,CSB_CCUSTO,CASE CSB_INDDC WHEN 'D' THEN -1 * CSB_VLPART WHEN 'C' THEN CSB_VLPART END CSB_VLPART FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSA") +" INNER JOIN " + RetSQLTab("CSB") +" ON CSA_FILIAL = CSB_FILIAL AND CSA_CODREV = CSB_CODREV AND CSA_DTLANC = CSB_DTLANC AND CSA_NUMLOT = CSB_NUMLOT WHERE CSA_CODREV= '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CSA_DTLANC = '"+TMPCSAENC->CSA_DTLANC+"' AND CSA_INDTIP = 'E' AND CSB_CODCTA IN ( SELECT DISTINCT CS3_CONTA FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS3") +" WHERE CS3_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CS3_CODNAT='04' AND "+ RetSQLCond("CS3") + " ) AND " + RetSQLCond("CSA,CSB") + " ) ABCDE GROUP BY CSB_CODCTA,CSB_CCUSTO " )
ECDQuery("TMPCSD",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSD") + " WHERE CSD_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSD_TPDEM = '1' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSD"))
ECDQuery("TMPCSEBP" ,1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSE") + " WHERE CSE_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSE_TPDEM = '1' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSE") + " ORDER BY CSE_CODAGL,CSE_NIVEL ")
ECDQuery("TMPCSEDRE",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSE") + " WHERE CSE_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSE_TPDEM = '2' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSE") + " ORDER BY CSE_CODAGL,CSE_NIVEL ")

register.description: Tabela de Historico de Fatos Contabeis

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCSN" ,1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSN") + " WHERE CSN_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV +"' AND"+ RetSQLCond("CSN") + " ORDER BY CSN_REG, CSN_CODFAT")
ECDQuery("TMPCSEDMPL",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSE") + " WHERE CSE_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSE_TPDEM IN('3','4') AND " + RetSQLCond("CSE") + " ORDER BY CSE_CODAGL,CSE_NIVEL ")

ECDQuery("TMPCSO" ,1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSO") + " WHERE CSO_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CSO_CODAGL = '"+TMPCSEDMPL->CSE_CODAGL +"' AND "+ RetSQLCond("CSO") + " ORDER BY CSO_REG, CSO_CODAGL, CSO_CODFAT")
ECDQuery("TMPCSEDFC",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSE") + " WHERE CSE_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSE_TPDEM = '5' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSE") + " ORDER BY CSE_CODAGL,CSE_NIVEL ")
ECDQuery("TMPCSEDVA",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSE") + " WHERE CSE_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSE_TPDEM = '6' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSE") + " ORDER BY CSE_CODAGL,CSE_NIVEL ")

register.description: Demonstração do Resultado Abrangente do Período

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI1",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

register.description: Demonstração do Resultado Abrangente do Período

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS1",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

register.description: Demonstração do Resultado Abrangente do Período

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM1",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )
ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI2",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '002' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS2",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '002' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM2",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '002' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS3",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '003' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM3",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '003' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI10",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '010' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS10",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '010' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM10",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '010' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI11",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '011' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS11",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '011' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM11",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '011' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI12",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '012' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS12",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '012' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM12",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '012' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI99",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '099' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI801",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J801' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS801",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J801' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM801",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J801' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )
ECDQuery("TMPCS8",1,"SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS8") + " WHERE CS8_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS8") )
ECDQuery("TMPCSP",1,"SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSP") + " WHERE CSP_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSP") )
